txt.en: Hunt oxen for parts at TBD ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Sadrech at her camp
'That ought to be plenty of meat and bones for now. I'm sure my injuries will heal well before my next outing.'

'I had originally come here to hunt for ox parts, but I doubt my aim will be true with these injuries. Those cursed Corsairs....

'If you are able, would you hunt in my stead? Any ox will do, but there also ought to be a herd just north of us. I've enough coin to pay you for your efforts, and the people of Melgobas would be grateful.

'Good hunting.'
You have obtained enough ox parts.\n\nYou should return to Sadrech at her camp.
Sadrech has asked you to hunt oxen in Anfalas for parts.\n\nThe Dun Ox herd north of her camp is also a good source of oxen.
Fresh injuries hinder Sadrech from hunting oxen for the people of Melgobas.
